Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Boston in 1989...
Injured on 7/21/1989 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/3/1992...
Injured on 6/20/1992 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 9-10 weeks...
Injured on 7/10/1993 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 6-7 weeks...
Traded from Boston to Cincinnati on 1/31/1996 (Going to BOS: 2B M. Lowell, P J. Hamilton, P G. McCarthy. Going to CIN: P P. Wagner)...
Injured on 5/19/1996 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
